summary: An extra Breezehome room that contains all the tools needed for crafting as well as some additional things (a bed, chest etc.) Still a work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
The Breezehome in Whiterun is pretty good since it\'s so close to the teleport. As you teleport to Whiterun you\'re only few steps away from it, so I thought why not add a new extra room that will contain all the crafting tools (smelter, forge etc.) as well as some other stuff such as a bed, chest, possibly even a special merchant. Still a work in progress.

An extra Breezehome room that contains all the tools needed for crafting as well as some additional things. Still a work in progress. 

Current version = 1.0

Version 0.9b brings the Teleportation Scroll! The Merchant in the room sells the scroll. The scroll will teleport you back to the Breezehome Craft Room when used. 

Possible bug: For some reason when I was testing all of this, a bunch of random NPCs appeared in the room through the door, but eventually, they all left and never came back. So make sure to keep a save handy, just in case if they do not leave. Report bugs if you find any please. Still haven\'t figured out why did they appear.

Also available on Steam workshop if anyone wants it there.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9103

How to install:

Download the files and extract it.
Copy the files to your \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder
Start up Skyrim, click Data and make sure that BreezehomeCraftRoom.esp is checked.
author: H4wkeye

files.name: Breezehome Craft Room 0_7a
files.changelogHtml: Fixed and oversight on my end where I locked the wrong chest and used it for the merchant

files.name: Breezehome Craft Room 0_9b
files.changelogHtml: Adjusted the price of the Teleport srcoll a bit.

files.name: Breezehome Craft Room 1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Renamed the Cell to Breezehome Craft Room (It\'ll now say that when you look at the doors leading to the room)
Tweaked the spell effect for the teleport scroll to make it look more colorful/prettier
Added a Mannequin, you can store your armor on it, as well as few weapon racks
Added more items to the Merchant (Gems, Processed Minerals)
Added an additional storage chest.
